title: Tesla’s Profit Dropped Sharply in First Quarter as It Cut Prices
description: The electric carmaker has reduced prices by thousands of dollars this year to bolster demand and fend off competition.

title: Fox Settles Dominion Suit, but Smartmatic Case and Others Loom
description: Another election technology company, Smartmatic, is suing news outlets, including Fox, over false claims of election fraud, and Dominion has other cases pending.

title: The Future of Social Media Is a Lot Less Social
description: Facebook, TikTok and Twitter seem to be increasingly connecting users with brands and influencers. To restore a sense of community, some users are trying smaller social networks.

title: A Tech Industry Pioneer Sees a Way for the U.S. to Lead in Advanced Chips
description: Ivan Sutherland played a key role in foundational computer technologies. Now he sees a path for America to claim the mantle in “superconducting” chips.

title: Fox News $787.5 Million Settlement and Embarrassing Disclosures: The Cost of Airing a Lie
description: Fox News’s late-stage agreement with Dominion Voting Systems came with a rare acknowledgment of broadcasting false claims by the conservative media powerhouse.

title: Fox Will Pay $787.5 Million to Settle Dominion Defamation Suit
description: The settlement with Dominion Voting Systems was the latest extraordinary twist in a case that exposed the inner workings of the most powerful voice in conservative news.
